    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<java.lang.Class> getBundlers()
      List fo Bundlers used by this Publisher
      PublisherConfig init(PublisherConfig config)
      Initializes this Publisher adding all the handlers that can interact with a Bundle.
      PublisherConfig process(PublishStatus status)
      Processes a Bundle, in order to do that it: Un-compress the Bundle file, then each handler for this Publisher will check if inside
      the bundle there is content it needs to be handle as each Handler handles a different type of content, and finally
      after the "handle" for each Handler the status are set depending if was a successful operation or not.

      • process

        public PublisherConfig process(PublishStatus status)
                        throws DotPublishingException
        Processes a Bundle, in order to do that it: Un-compress the Bundle file, then each handler for this Publisher will check if inside
        the bundle there is content it needs to be handle as each Handler handles a different type of content, and finally
        after the "handle" for each Handler the status are set depending if was a successful operation or not.
        Specified by:
        process in interface IPublisher
        Specified by:
        process in class Publisher
        Parameters:
        status - Current status of the Publishing process
        Returns:
        This bundle configuration (PublisherConfig)
        Throws:
        DotPublishingException - If fails Handling any on the elements of this bundle
